job.title: Sr/Lead Software Engineer - Python, NLP, ML (REMOTE)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: If you are a SrLead Software Engineer coming from a strong Python  NLPML background looking for full remote please read onltbrgtltbrgtLocated in San Mateo California  we are a VCfunded company disrupting a 15B market and using AI to mine unstructured data Our founders include some of the top Big Data startup veterans with excellent track recordsltbrgtltbrgtThese all will be full time offering base pay  generous equity  full benefits  full remoteltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be Doingltbrgtltulgtltligt We are looking for a Sr Software Engineer itching to solve large real world problems by applying NLPML techniques on unstructured Enterprise data  eg emails call transcripts and documentsltligtltligt You will be responsible for design and development of enterprise grade features and microservices involving information retrieval text mining classifier models and recommender systemsltligtltligt The role also requires proficient understanding of computer programming fundamentals and solid knowledge of Python and structural programming languages such as Javaltligtltligt Our application is designed to run both onprem and SaaS hence understanding of docker based microservices is requiredltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt 7 years experience in software development of which 4 years are in Python Flask or Django Restful Frameworks information retrieval processing with Pandas and NLP frameworksincluding but not limited to Stanford Core NLP NLTK and Scikitlearnltligtltligt Experience implementing modern ML classifier models and recommender systems eg Bayesian Adaptive Methodltligtltligt Proficiency in development stacks including SQL and NoSQL JSON formats Restful Servicesltligtltligt Comfortable running Docker containers for sandbox development and during code integrationltligtltligt Experience with Linux Java Spring Elastic Search Postgres Cassandra and AWS EC2 systems is an added plusltbrgtltligtltulgtWhats In It for Youltbrgtltulgtltligt Competitive base payltligtltligt Equityltligtltligt Full benefits packageltligtltligt HUGE room for career growthltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a SrLead Software Engineer looking for a challenge please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtBobbyJuneOptellocomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  BJ11639072  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtBobby June  Recruiting Manager  OptelloltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOptello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right
